speaker.whotheyare: BCG's Nimisha Jain is a managing director and partner at the firm's New Delhi offices.
speaker.whylisten: Nimisha Jain is the global leader of BCG's Centre for Customer Insight (CCI) and leads BCG's marketing and sales practice in Asia-Pacific. She has researched more than 500,000 consumers in emerging markets over the last decade in order to understand their needs, motivators and behavior -- and has written over 25 publications on this topic. She leverages deep consumer insight, marketing, innovation, digital and go-to-market transformation to help organizations and brands drive breakout growth. Before joining the firm, she worked as a consultant at The Monitor Group, and in sales and marketing at Nestlé.
